TuneIn | San Francisco, Los Angeles | ONSITE, US remote OK

We're an online listening(radio, sport, podcasts, etc) startup with 70 million active users in a very competitive market. The company is about 150 people, with steady revenue and plenty funding. Good perks, interesting problems and great work life balance. More details here: http://tunein.com/careers/

Feel free to apply directly from career page, or send me your resume at byang@tunein.com and I'll make sure they are seen by our recruiters.
